title: Twistor correspondence
summary: In mathematical physics, the twistor correspondence or Penroseâ€“Ward correspondence is a bijection between instantons on complexified Minkowski space and holomorphic vector bundles on twistor space, which as a complex manifold is P 3 {\displaystyle \mathbb {P} ^{3}} , or complex projective 3-space.
